item.title: COVID-19 Country Map Homework
item.description: 利用JSON数据绘制国家疫情地图 首先导入我们需要的几个 R 包： library(dplyr) #数据预处理 ## Warning: 程辑包'dplyr'是用R版本3.6.3 来建造的 ## ## 载入程辑包：'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(maptools) #用于读取地图矢量数据 ## Warning: 程辑包'maptools'是用R版本3.6.3 来建造的 ## 载入需要的程辑包：sp ## Warning: 程辑包'sp'是用R版本3.6.3 来建造的 ## Checking rgeos availability: TRUE require(rgdal) #读取地图数据 ## 载入需要的程辑包：rgdal ## Warning: 程辑包'rgdal'是用R版本3.6.3 来建造的 ## rgdal: version: 1.4-8, (SVN revision 845) ## Geospatial Data Abstraction Library extensions to R successfully loaded ## Loaded GDAL runtime: GDAL 2.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
